extraction_metadata.notes: HIGH VALUE CASE: $750K loss. BRAND IMPERSONATION: Singapore Exchange + Coinhako. Sophisticated partnership scam - Jenny 'invested' $550K of 'her own money' to create $1M combined balance illusion. Multi-stage fee extraction: 10% unlock fee → second lock → $400K demand → split payment offer.

chain_of_thought.step_1_initial_contact: Jenny Wang contacted victim on Line Chat messaging app
chain_of_thought.step_2_trust_building: Extended conversations building relationship and trust
chain_of_thought.step_3_proof_of_concept: Small trades totaling several thousand dollars, then $2K withdrawal allowed
chain_of_thought.step_4_escalation: Victim invested additional $200K, saw balance rise to $450K
chain_of_thought.step_5_partnership_trap: Jenny 'invested' $550K of 'her own money', creating $1M combined illusion
chain_of_thought.step_6_extraction_loop: Account locked → 10% fee paid → locked again → $400K demanded → split offer
